title: Avatar the Last Airbender
alt: Aang the Avatar, Katara, Sokka, Toph, and Zuko looking ready to fight together
description: In a world where people can manipulate the elements through bending, Aang, the last surviving Airbender and the current Avatar, must master all four elements to bring balance and peace to the war-torn world.

title: Dragon Ball Z
alt: Goku, Gohan, Vegeta, Piccolo, and Krillin looking ready to fight their enemies
description: Follow the adventures of Goku, a powerful warrior, defending Earth from formidable foes, including intergalactic invaders and androids.

title: Hey Arnold
alt: Arnold, Gerald, Helga, and Helga swing on a large tire swing
description: Join Arnold, a kind-hearted fourth-grader, and his friends as they face everyday challenges in their fictional city.

title: Rugrats
alt: Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil, Dil, Angelica, Susie, and Spike sit on a large chair looking ready to play
description: Follow the adventures of Tommy Pickles and a group of imaginative babies as they navigate toddlerhood, going on imaginary journeys.

title: X Men
alt: Wolverine, Cyclops, Jean Grey, Storm, Beast, Rogue, Gambit, and Jubilee stand together ready to fight Magneto
description: Witness the struggles of the X-Men, a team of mutant superheroes led by Professor Charles Xavier, as they fight for the peaceful coexistence of mutants and humans while facing powerful foes.
